metadata.job_to_be_done: Prepare a vegetarian buffet-style dinner menu for a corporate gathering, including gluten-free items.

subsection_analysis.refined_text: • In a food processor, combine dates, mixed nuts, dried fruit, and honey. • Process until the mixture comes together. • Press the mixture into a greased baking dish. • Refrigerate for at least 1 hour before cutting into bars. •

o Roast bell peppers until charred, then peel and seed. o Blend peppers, walnuts, breadcrumbs, minced garlic, olive oil, pomegranate molasses, cumin, and salt in a food processor until smooth. o Serve with pita bread. Mutabal 

o Drain and rinse chickpeas. o Blend chickpeas, tahini, lemon juice, minced garlic, and salt in a food processor. o Slowly add olive oil while blending until smooth. o Serve with a drizzle of olive oil. Japchae 

o Roast eggplants until soft, then peel and mash. o Blend mashed eggplant, tahini, lemon juice, minced garlic, and salt in a food processor. o Slowly add olive oil while blending until smooth. o Serve with a drizzle of olive oil. Baked Beans 

o Drain and rinse chickpeas. o Blend chickpeas, diced onion, minced garlic, chopped parsley, cumin, coriander, and salt in a food processor. o Add flour and mix until combined. o Form mixture into balls and fry in hot oil until golden.
